recipe.title: Berry Rosé Sangria
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups assorted berries such as blackberries, blueberries, and raspberries
2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice, or to taste
instructions: Put berries into a heatproof pitcher. Bring sugar, water, and crème de cassis just to a simmer in a small saucepan, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Pour syrup into heatproof pitcher and let stand 5 minutes. Add wine and lemon juice and stir mixture well. Chill, covered, until ready to serve. Serve over ice.
